page.title: 19MY HOUSE IN CHICKENLEY
page.content: Our house is semi-detached and it is on a council estate.It is made of brick with a tile roof. In my house there are 6 rooms,the kitchen, living room, 3 bedrooms, the bathroom and the toilet is in a separate room. At the front and back of my house are gardens with green grass and lovely flowers. Sometimes I play in the garden with a ball. In my house we have a television which I sometimes watch . When it is cold I turn on the gas fire.We also have a gas cooker but we have electric lighting. I have 2 brothers and 4 sisters and my mother does all the preparing for our meals.For breakfast I normally have toast with lots of butter. For Sunday dinner we have chicken, peas, carrots and stuffing. Ater dinner we wash the plates with a scrubber.
